citation.article-title: Ferribacterium limneticum, gen. nov., sp. nov., an Fe(III)-reducing microorganism isolated from mining-impacted freshwater lake sediments.

p.s: Description of Ferribacterium limneticum sp. nov.
Ferribacterium limneticum (lim.ne'ti.cum L. neut. limne, lake; N. L. adj. limneticum, rod-shaped iron bacterium from a lake)
The description is the same as for the genus.

The type strain of F. limneticum, CdA-1, has been deposited in the American Type Culture Collection under ATCC 700589. F. limneticum was isolated from iron and trace-element enriched sediments of Lake Coeur dâ€™Alene, Idaho.
